trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Morrison
There were no other sightings in Morrison on or around July 12th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI RECORDED THE ESPN2 BROADCAST OF THE NHRA DENVER DRAG RACE, RAN ON THE WEEKEND OF JULY 12TH. IN THE OPENING CREDITS, THERE IS A PAMORAMIC VIEW OF THE LOCAL AREA WITH A LARGE MOUNTAIN. AS YOU CAN EASILY SEE, SOME THING AT INCREDABLE SPEED STREAKS ACROSS THE SKY, IN THE UPPER RIGHT CORNER. IN SLOW MOTION IT APPEARS TO BE CONE SHAPED, SILVER, AND INGULFED IN A VAPOR TRAIL.
